biotools.summary: BC_subtyping allows the stratification of breast cancer (BC) expression profiles from RNA-seq data into intrinsic molecular subtypes using improved versions of the dataset-level PAM50 test or single-sample machine learning-based classifiers.

bioschemas.name: BC_Intrinsic_subtyping
bioschemas.summary: BC_subtyping allows the stratification of breast cancer (BC) expression profiles from RNA-seq data into intrinsic molecular subtypes using improved versions of the dataset-level PAM50 test or single-sample machine learning-based classifiers.
